translation: Tohụ̄ krụ̄ nav mal chh solbh gy hnzi lalchhi th fkhrn (ạkhrt nishhi) ghạfl.
Avt tam zi tohụ̄ gyv qbrn mnz vạtith.
Hrgz nh! (mal th dvlth yinavnh tvhyhi bkar) tohyhi lgyv ʿnqryb (yhi ḥqyqt) pe.
Byyhi (chih bakhbr yivan krnh) hrgz nh,ʿnqryb lgyv tohyhi (panun anjam) pe.
Ā ā!kash tohụ̄zạnihiv (mal v zrchh lalchhi hundth pnnhi ghfltuk anjam) yqyny ʿlmh san (tylhi mshrạvihiv nh ạkhrt yithh pạtthụ̄ dunyahs mnz ms gczhth).
Tohụ̄ vuchihv (pnnhi lalchhi hndis ntyjs mnz) jhnm ẓrvr.
Pth vuchhvun suh tohụ̄ ẓrvr yqyn chh achh sintụ̄.
Pth yiyav tohyhi tamhi doh (Allah tʿālyā snzn) nʿmtn mtʿlq ẓrvr pczhnh (zi tohyhi kthi kthi th kmhi kmhi āyhi kryv timh khrch).
